comment: The worst and most disorganized professor ever. I wonder how she's still teaching. Can't figure out our grades, a day before the final still haven't posted a grade that is a lot of points. Puts so much more stress on the students with all this.

Worst teacher I have ever had. On 1 ppt alone we had 54 boxes/tables/pages we had to look up, that's not including the other material. This was for 1 lecture. She gave us a 3 pg study guide for test. Then comes in after test and says, "Well I guess you know that was a FYI study guide." None of it was on the test. You cannot follow her lectures. RUN
